allow: Bash(python -m pytest tests/test_model_orchestrator.py tests/test_real_navigation.py::TestOrchestratorSelectionLogic tests/test_real_navigation.py::TestAnnotatedScreenshot tests/test_agent.py tests/test_llm_client.py tests/test_selector.py -v)

Bash(timeout 120 python main.py --query "Go to https://example.com and tell me the page title and main heading" --provider local --base-url http://localhost:11434/v1 --max-iterations 5 --log-level INFO --headless)

Bash(timeout 300 python main.py --query "Go to https://example.com and tell me the page title and main heading" --provider local --base-url http://localhost:11434/v1 --max-iterations 5 --log-level INFO --headless)

Bash(python main.py --query "Navigate to https://example.com and report the page title and h1 heading" --provider local --base-url http://localhost:11434/v1 --max-iterations 3 --log-level INFO --headless)

Bash(python main.py --query "Go to en.wikipedia.org, search for ''Python programming language'', then tell me the year it was first released and who created it" --provider local --base-url http://localhost:11434/v1 --model lfm2.5-thinking:latest --no-orchestrator --max-iterations 8 --log-level INFO --headless)

Bash(python main.py --query "Go to https://pypi.org, search for ''playwright'', and tell me the name and description of the first result" --provider local --base-url http://localhost:11434/v1 --model ministral-3:3b --no-orchestrator --max-iterations 7 --initial-url about:blank --log-level INFO --headless)

Bash(python main.py --query "Go to https://pypi.org, use the search box to search for ''playwright'', and tell me the name and short description of the first result" --provider local --base-url http://localhost:11434/v1 --model ministral-3:3b --no-orchestrator --max-iterations 7 --log-level INFO --headless)
Bash(python benchmark/benchmark_navigation.py --configs A B C F --max-iterations 8)
Bash(python benchmark/benchmark_navigation.py --configs A B C D --max-iterations 5)
